attributes.action: Scrap the discrimination of the new inheritence tax threshold against single people and apply it to everybody.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new tax limit discriminates against single people, the new allowance must be fair and should apply to all.  It is a tax on taxed income and is nothing more than theft.   Why should two families owning identical houses be taxed in two separate ways? One house will safeguard £600,000, but next door only £300,000 because two siblings share it.
